{{ctitle|va_copy}}
{{cpp/utility/variadic/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|cstdarg}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|
void va_copy( std::va_list dest, std::va_list src );
}}
{{dcl end}}

The {{tt|va_copy}} macro copies {{c|src}} to {{c|dest}}.

{{lc|va_end}} should be called on {{c|dest}} before the function returns or any subsequent re-initialization of {{c|dest}} (via calls to {{lc|va_start}} or {{lc|va_copy}}).

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|dest|an instance of the {{lc|va_list}} type to initialize}}
{{par|src|the source {{lc|va_list}} that will be used to initialize {{c|dest}}}}
{{par end}}

===Expanded value===
(none)

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cmath&gt;
#include &lt;cstdarg&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

double sample_stddev(int count, ...) 
{
    double sum = 0;
    std::va_list args1;
    va_start(args1, count);
    std::va_list args2;
    va_copy(args2, args1);
    for (int i = 0; i &lt; count; ++i)
    {
        double num = va_arg(args1, double);
        sum += num;
    }
    va_end(args1);
    double mean = sum / count;

    double sum_sq_diff = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i &lt; count; ++i)
    {
        double num = va_arg(args2, double);
        sum_sq_diff += (num - mean) * (num - mean);
    }
    va_end(args2);
    return std::sqrt(sum_sq_diff / count);
}

int main() 
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; sample_stddev(4, 25.0, 27.3, 26.9, 25.7) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
0.920258
}}
